resources.string: To win the game, you need to fill out all squares, and there can not be any similar numbers in either vertical or horizontal direction from each square.\n\nYou can not have similar numbers in vertical and horizontal direction within the 3x3 groups.

You can mark squares that you are uncertain of by pressing on the square until it changes colour.
To remove the colour, simply just press the square again until it changes the colour back to normal. 

To check if you have won the game, hit the Check button.
You need to select a difficulty!
